artview.plugins.ManualUnfold¶

class artview.plugins.ManualUnfold(Vradar=None, Vpoints=None, name=' ManualUnfold', parent=None)[source]¶

Bases: artview.core.core.Component

Use of Points to Unfold Velocity in Radar

__init__(Vradar=None, Vpoints=None, name=' ManualUnfold', parent=None)[source]¶

Initialize the class to create the interface.

Parameters:

[Optional] :

Vradar : Variable instance

Radar signal variable. A value of None will instantiate a empty variable.

Vpoints : Variable instance

Points signal variable. A value of None will instantiate a empty variable.

name : string

Field Radiobutton window name.

parent : PyQt instance

Parent instance to associate to this class. If None, then Qt owns, otherwise associated with parent PyQt instance.

Methods

ManualUnfold.NewRadar(variable, strong) respond to change in radar.
ManualUnfold.foldBack() Undo last unfolding.
ManualUnfold.getFieldNames()
ManualUnfold.guiStart([parent]) Graphical interface for starting this class.
ManualUnfold.negativeUnfold()
ManualUnfold.positiveUnfold()
ManualUnfold.unfold(side)
